remarks: A subclass relationship depends only on a relation's ordered pairs. Theorem 3.2(i) of [Monk1] p. 33.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
statement:
ssrel $p |- ( Rel A -> ( A C_ B <-> A. x A. y ( <. x , y >. e. A -> <. x , y >. e. B ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
